article: secretary of state condoleezza rice accused iran and syria on wednesday of instigating muslim protests triggered by drawings of the prophet muhammad , and president george w. bush pleaded for an end to violence .
abstract: bush exhorts leaders of nations to stop violence stemming from drawings of prophet muhammed
